title: Math 300Z
text:
Math 300Z is the prototype for scheduled revisions to Math 300. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons will come from Math 300.
Lesson 19. Topic: Variation :: Reading, Activity: measuring by eye
Lesson 20: Topic: DAGs and simulation :: Reading, Activity: Smoking and birthweight
Inference

title: Math 300Z
text:
Course textbooks
Both Math 300 and Math 300Z will start with Chapters 1 through 6 of Statistical Inference via Data Science.
For the second half of the semester, Math 300Z continues with Lessons in Statistical Thinking. Math 300, continues with Chapter 7 through 11 of Statistical Inference via Data Science
 | | 
Both textbooks are available free online.

title: Math 300Z
text:
Software
The POSIT.cloud workspaces will already have the packages installed. If you are running RStudio on your laptop (that is, not in a browser), the following command will install the packages.
install.packages(c("mosaic", "ggplot", "dplyr", "openintro", "moderndive", "nycflights13", "knitr"))
# addition package for Math 300Z
remotes::install_github("dtkaplan/math300")

Regression
Readings 11. SLR: Continuous x 12. SLR: Discrete x 13. SLR: Related topics 14. Multiple regression: Numerical & discrete 15. Multiple regression: Two numerical 16. Multiple regression: Related topics 17. Multiple regression: Conclusion/review 18. GR 2 (chapters 5-6)
